alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Logan; Madison; Miami; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 8:12PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CHAMPAIGN, SOUTHERN LOGAN AND NORTHERN CLARK COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTH CENTRAL MADISON, SOUTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO AND NORTHEASTERN MIAMI COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 812 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Urbana, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, half inch hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Marysville, Bellefontaine, Urbana, Plain City, St. Paris, West Liberty, Mechanicsburg, North Lewisburg, De Graff, Harmony, Milford Center, Christiansburg, North Hampton, Fletcher, South Vienna, Tremont City, Woodstock, Catawba and Unionville Center. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 50 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central and west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Clark; Logan; Madison; Miami; Union
